desc: At Patchology, we believe that effective skin care is the best form of self care. Whether you’re dealing with puffy eyes, dry skin or dry cracked feet, we have the best under eye gels, sheet masks and foot peel masks to help you look and feel relaxed.

layout.text: Shout out to all our Glow Getters! For a limited time, you can brighten your day when you add a few Vitamin C packed freebies to any purchase of $60 or more.
